reviewText: It is perfect. I mean, yes, all of the text is in spanish, but i got over that. The title screen is beautiful and it has my favorite performance that Gorillaz has ever done on it. This was the best investment i have made with my money in a long time.

For some reason the dvd I got in the mail has Spanish explanations for the songs & dvd information. Not sure if that's because I got a bootleg version of it or if that's the way it was released? The sound quality is also off. I haven't tried to set my player to a different setting for stereo, I have a bose system so that may affect the quality of sound? All in all not bad for the money.
